attributes.action: Minimise the topics necessary in the JUNE 2021 GCSE exams.
attributes.additional_details: We believe the content in all exams needs to be reduced by a significant amount. Students learn all the content needed for their GCSE course over a 2 year period, losing 6 months of time has had a significant detriment on the learning of students across the country.
attributes.background: We want to direct the Secretary of State for Education to require Ofqual to reduce the exam content for all subjects in the June 2021 exam series.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/320772
